description: Logary is a high performance, multi-target logging, metric and health-check library for mono and .Net.
releaseNotes:
Release Notes:

 * [infra] bump semver to 150
 * [whitespace]
 * [csharp] adding missing Extension attribute
 * [docs] documenting new influxdb stuff and adding notes to C# functions
 * [infra] bump patch locally
 * Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into feature/csharp-revamp
 * Merge pull request #191 from adamchester/literate-target-2
 * Merge pull request #190 from adamchester/literate-tests
 * [literate] add LiterateConsoleConf.formatLocalTime,
 * [literate] add literate console basic tests
 *  tests for Message.templateEvent<>
 * Merge pull request #188 from adamchester/build-debug
 * Use Debug for Logary.Tests Debug solution configuration
 * [influxdb] passing serialisation tests
 * [influxdb] InfluxDb target changes
 * [docs] started documenting InfluxDb schema as sent through Logary
 * [logger] adding TimeScope( ... )
 * [infra] generate xmldoc for influxdb target
 * [core] Finally the Ack implementation is correct
 * [core] removing stray printfn
 * [infra] bump patch
 * [core] Console and LiterateConsole
 * [csharp] tests project update
 * [csharp] avoid overload resolution failure, docs
 * [csharp] churn
 * [infra] churn; compile win perf counters in Release by default
 * [csharp] passing double-ack tests
 * [core] Fixes #185
 * [infra] adding editorconfig
 * [csharp] remove printfn, correcting codedocs, Message extensions+
 * [examples] minor update
 * [infra] update to non-Job-wrapped internal logging API
 * [csharp] passing C# test suite
 * [config] support configuring Logary internals without running jobs
 * [csharp] adding LogEventFormat
 * [csharp] working through API
 * [csharp] creating extensive C# API in Logary core library
 * [csharp] started adding complete C# facade
 * Merge pull request #170 from adamchester/literate-target
 * Fix background colour reset
 * literateTokeniseFraction and mono stack trace prefix
 * toSeq
 * Break up tokenising into smaller pieces
 * Literate: render Binary as hex, bool lowercase, less theme garbage,
 * More literate, distinguish arrays and objects nicely
 * Introduce ConsoleColours and ColouredText,
 * More Object rendering
 * More literate target
 * [literate] initial work on literate console target
 * Merge pull request #183 from adamchester/literate-too-many-ex-nl
 * [facade] even less exception new lines
 * [facade] less new lines in literate exceptions
title: Logary.Targets.Riemann
